{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = In 1998, parliament pushed through changes in how police departments were to count crime

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:50.239
    | text      = So they made new counting rules and introduced the National Crime Recording Standard, which

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
